<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 18"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Deep Lore](/Feats.aspx?ID=208) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Bard" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=19" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 103 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[enigma muse](/Muses.aspx?ID=1); Legendary in [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11)

</column>

---

Your repertoire is vast, containing far more spells than usual. Add one spell to your repertoire of each level you can cast.
name: Deep Lore
